dc_title_s: Nobilis fluvius Albis: maximâ curâ, ex variis, famosique Autoribus collectus, et in lucem editus; a Ioanne Ianssonio.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. North oriented to the bottom of the map. Includes inscription "Amplissimis, consutitissimis, et prudentissimis Viris Senatoribus, consulibusque Republcæ Hamburgensis hanc celeberrimi Fluminis Albis delineationem, summa studio ac nitor elaboratam, benevolo animo dat, dicat donat". View of "Emporium Hamburgum" found in lower right of map. complete with an index of some of the buildings, crowned by a coat of arms of Hamburg. Includes illustrations of cartographers working around the scale cartouche. 1 map in 2 parts; 18 x 52 cm. each, on sheet 47 x 58 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Atlantis Maioris Appendix, 1630.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
